description: Primary login application running on localhost:8080. Apache 2.4.65 web server running a login/authentication system using Bootstrap 5.3.0-alpha1 framework.

endpoints: /login (GET/POST - Authentication page, form validation on client-side only)
/resource (GET - Resource loader with filename parameter, potential path traversal)
/static (GET - Directory listing enabled, public access to CSS/JS)

notes:
Critical Findings:
1. Directory listing is ENABLED on /static/ and subdirectories - information disclosure
2. Suspicious 'flag' file exists at /static/flag but returns 403 Forbidden
3. /resource endpoint with filename parameter is potential path traversal vulnerability
4. Login form performs validation only on client-side (JavaScript preventDefault)
5. Application redirects / to /login
6. Allows HTTP methods: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS on /login
7. POST to /login returns 302 redirect back to /login
